title: My husband lost his job, I don't work we can't pay our mortgage or credit cards
question: We lost our savings to save our credit cards and to pay our mortgage. We got a loan mod for our house in az and we rent in ca. He is not working and I take care of the children as I cannot find a job making enough to pay anything. We cannot make our payments on our house, rent or credit cards, what can we do to alleviate some debt.
answers:
Based on the description you have provided, it would appear Bankruptcy is a viable solution for your family. You should contact a Bankruptcy Attorney in your area to discuss your options.

Good luck.

I strongly encourage you to discuss the specifics of your finances and your situation with a Bankruptcy attorney. All details are kept confidential and you would then be able to provide more details on your situation without posting them on a public message site. Though you may be a good candidate for a bankruptcy filing, there may be other alternatives available for your situation.

If you would like more information, feel free to visit my website or contact me for a consultation.
